name: Weeaboo Hotline
description:
It's the first day at Art school a.k.a Weeb School and you already run into trouble. Will you ever be able to fit in or will you end up turning your new friends into non-weebs?

There's a total of 10 endings!!

- 3 Good Endings

- 3 Better Endings

- 3 Bad Endings

- And One mystery ending! (Oh my!)

This game is our first game and it was created in Renpy. Game play is around 10 minutes. Feel free to give us feedback so we can create games that are even better in the future!

If there are any bugs in the game please tell us immediately!

UPDATE ver 1.1: Mod Gen here! I've realized the endings aren't entirely clear, as in when you get to an ending it just goes back to the title screen so I fixed it.

P.S. THANK YOU FOR PLAYING OUR GAME WE APPRECIATE IT SO MUCH!
